trans-unit.source: Contains arguments associated with changes to a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder argumenter som er tilknyttet endringer i en <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Attached events supported by this delegate include are provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager> class, and include <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput>), <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart>), and <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate>).
trans-unit.target: Vedlagte støttes av denne representanten blant annet er angitt av den <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager>klasse, og ta med <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>(<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput>), <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart>(<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart>), og <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>(<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate>).</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputDevice"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> as initial values for the class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs"> </xref> klasse, tar et angitt <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputDevice"> </xref> og <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> som opprinnelige verdier for klassen.

trans-unit.source: The input device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte enheten knyttet til denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> object associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> objektet som er tilknyttet denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets control text associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Henter kontrollere tekst som er knyttet til en <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A string containing any control text associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder teksten en kontroll som er forbundet med denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer hendelsesbehandling på en måte typespesifikke, noe som kan øke hendelsen system effektivitet.

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen kaster generisk behandlingsprogrammet som en <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventHandler>og aktiverer det.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer informasjon om denne implementeringen mønsteret og årsaker til den <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>og [rutet hendelser oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: Generell behandlingsprogrammet å kalle på en typespesifikke måte.

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
Gets system text associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Henter system-tekst som er tilknyttet en <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A string containing any system text associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder alle system-tekst som er tilknyttet denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets input text associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Henter angi tekst som er knyttet til en <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the input text associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder inndatateksten som er tilknyttet denne hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> knyttet til en <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"></xref> object containing the text composition associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TextComposition"> </xref> objektet som inneholder tekstjustering som er tilknyttet denne hendelsen.
